ConceptDef.label: Giddy-up!: How to mount
ConceptDef.helpText: To mount an animal for battling, draft a pawn and right click an animal with obedience training and click 'mount'.

ConceptDef.label: Giddy-up!: Enemy mounts
ConceptDef.helpText: Enemy pawns can also mount animals. The chance they use mounts, and where they get their mounts from (wild animals from your biome, wild animals from any biome, or non-wild animals) can be configured in the mod options. Enemy pawns with a high animal handling skill have a larger chance to use rare mounts
